query:
SELECT 'papers' as tbl, COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(publishedAt) = '2026-03-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as today_published,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2026-03-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as today_created
FROM papers
UNION ALL
SELECT 'news_items', COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(publishedAt) = '2026-03-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2026-03-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM news_items
UNION ALL
SELECT 'products', COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(publishedAt) = '2026-03-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2026-03-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM products
UNION ALL
SELECT 'insights', COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(publishedAt) = '2026-03-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2026-03-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM insights;
